#summary Initialize a fresh inventory for the specified user.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||AddInventory||String||Yes||
||`OwnerID`||UUID of the user this inventory will belong to||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=AddInventory
&OwnerID=e4709e21-9a3f-4276-b3cc-22224bdf0199
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a FolderID was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`FolderID`||UUID of the root folder. This is always the same UUID as the `OwnerID`||UUID||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
    "FolderID":"e4709e21-9a3f-4276-b3cc-22224bdf0199"
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"User account not found"
}
}}}
